page.title: 02Churches in Burford
page.content: There has been a significant growth in the ecumenical life of the varying Christian traditions in the Burford area.United services are held on such occasions as Good Friday.Every Lent a series of discussion sessions occur in the Burford School.These greatly help real understanding between churches.The united Songs of Praise are held three times a year.Further work together is shared in the Christian Aid Collection and the Refugee Aid Group.The Vicar of Burford is also responsible for Fulbrook and Taynton.The Methodist minister Rev I Roach is responsible for Burford,Carterton,Brize Norton,Minster Lovell & Filkins.The Roman Catholic priest Rev G Smith is responsible for Burford.Rev F Cockett is a retired Baptist minister responsible for Burford.The Society of Friends (Quakers)holds meetings in Burford.
